Berserk:




The pod hatch rose, letting out a prision that had drifted into space 
in stasis lock. He jumped out with a violent leap, near to smashing 
the pod. He landed with a heavy thud with his long loin cloth flowing 
down past his knees. His feet hit soft ground. He looked down, 
knowing he was no longer on Cybertron. There were green things 
sticking out from the ground. He picked his head up and looked 
around. There was a blue sky with white things floating past that 
weren't ships. There were brown and green things sprouting from the 
ground that weren't buildings either.

Berserk sneered. This was out of Cybertron. This was no where near 
home. He looked at the pod. The Predacon defenses had forced him 
inside that thing out of his own will. They sent him somewhere far 
from Cybertron for behind what he was and couldn't help but being. 

He was on another planet. He took a step back, glaring up. There was 
one moon and creatures all bout. Birds flew across the sky.

It had a serenity, but it didn't sooth his confusion. After a moment, 
he started off. He had to find what he was going to do here.
